name: Cloud architect
description:
Parallels Remote Application Server is a virtual application and desktop delivery solution allowing users to access and use applications and data from any device. From an engineering perspective it's a technically challenging and interesting project, involving many programming languages, distributed across several operating systems and platforms, working on-prem or in the cloud.

If you’re ambitious and thrive on working with the world’s big company to solve tough problems together with a smart, motivated team, you would want to work here.

Key skills:

  • .NET Core
  • Event Driven Architecture
  • Microservice architecture
  • CQRS-like
  • Feature-based CI/CD
  • Configuration management, SQL/NOSQL

Responsibilities:

  • Architectural supervision
  • Maintaining the uniformity and integrity of the system
  • Implement design to split monolithic application into multicomponent one
  • Overseeing cloud security and performance

Requirements:

  • Have 7+ years of experience in application/service development or software engineering
  • Understanding "Secure by Design" and other security principles in software development
  • Experience with designing high-performance, scalability, maintainability, reliability services
  • Experience with .NET core
  • Experience with design and implementation of Event Driven and Microservice applications
  • Experience in CQRS-like design approaches
  • Knowledge of virtualization and containerization
  • Proficient understanding of feature-based CI/CD
  • Proficient understanding of centralized Configuration management
  • Experience in using SQL/NoSQL DBs
  • Proficient understanding of DDD
  • Experience of splitting monolithiс application is a plus
  • Understanding of Web client development is a plus
  • Cloud certification (Azure, AWS, GCP) is a plus

Benefits

  • Competitive salary
  • Learn new technologies and platforms, participating on conferences
  • Flexible work schedule, ability to work remotely
  • Occasional business trips to Maltese office
  • Friendly team of experienced multinational professionals
  • Medical and dental insurance
  • Gym discount
